dataTemplate.name: XXQAPRDR
dataTemplate.description: OD : Protocol Review and Development Report

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT OD_OB_PRID ,OD_OB_REF_PRID ,OD_SC_REGION ,OD_PB_DATE_VERIFIED ,OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS ,OD_PB_DATE_APPROVED ,OD_OB_PR_NO ,OD_PB_PROTOCOL_NAME ,OD_PB_PROTOCOL_ACTIVITY_TYPE ,OD_PB_CATEGORY ,OD_PB_COMPANY ,OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME ,OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL ,OD_PB_ATTACHMENT ,OD_PB_COMMENTS ,OD_PB_DATE_RENEW ,USER ,COLLECTION_ID ,CREATION_DATE FROM q_od_ob_protocol_review_v WHERE 1=1 AND NVL(OD_OB_PRID,'X') = NVL(:P_PRID,NVL(OD_OB_PRID,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_REF_PRID,'X') = NVL(:P_PRID_REF,NVL(OD_OB_REF_PRID,'X')) AND NVL(OD_SC_REGION,'X') = NVL(:P_REGION,NVL(OD_SC_REGION,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS,'X') = NVL(:P_APPROVAL_STATUS,NVL(OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_PR_NO,1) = NVL(:P_PRTCL_ID,NVL(OD_OB_PR_NO,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_PROTOCOL_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_PRTCL_NAME,NVL(OD_PB_PROTOCOL_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_PROTOCOL_ACTIVITY_TYPE,'X') = NVL(:P_PRTCL_TYPE,NVL(OD_PB_PROTOCOL_ACTIVITY_TYPE,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_CATEGORY,'X') = NVL(:P_PRODUCT_CATEGORY,NVL(OD_PB_CATEGORY,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_COMPANY,'X') = NVL(:P_SP_NAME,NVL(OD_PB_COMPANY,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_SUBMITTER,NVL(OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X') = NVL(:P_APPROVER,NVL(OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X')) ORDER BY OD_OB_PRID
